More and more foreign companies are moving their industrial chains to Vietnam, according to sputniknews, a Russian satellite news agency. This process began before the Sino US trade war. When Vietnam successfully defeated the new coronavirus, it was in full swing. This country, with a population of nearly 100 million, borders with China and has active international exchanges. It has no more than 400 patients and no deaths. Compared with other countries, this country has got rid of isolation and related economic crisis earlier.
